title-group.article-title: Symptoms, Treatment, and Responses to Medications Used to Treat Bipolar Disorder

contrib.aff: Mental Health RN, Overland Park, KS

ack.p: The author wishes to acknowledge the following individuals who assisted and supported her writing of the pharmacology for mental health conditions in children and adolescents series: her family; Sarah O’Neal, LPN; Marc Finks; Jonathan Finks, MD; and her co-workers—Amy Carr, APRN, Sobia Shaffie, MD, and Danna Boehm, BSN, RN.

bio.p: Karin has been a nurse with Johnson County Mental Health Community Support Services in Mission, Kansas, since 2004. She works in outpatient clinics and inpatient adolescent substance abuse treatment centers. She previously taught BSN and RN mental health nursing and was charge RN in adolescent/child inpatient hospital units.
